item0.name: Infinity Edge
item0.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Muramana
item3.description:
35 Attack Damage
860 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Shock: When targetting champions, Ability strikes and Attacks ( On-Hit) apply an additional (2.5% max Mana) physical damage.

item4.name: Essence Reaver
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage + 40% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and restores 40% of this damage as Mana (1.5s cooldown).

item5.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Lethal Tempo
perk0.shortDesc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
perk0.longDesc:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 40 - 110% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
